page.title: 15Windmill Hill Area
page.content: Good communications are vital for any business and it is therefore not surprising to find many warehouses and a new business centre next to the {M4 motorway}where between 900 and 1300 cars and lorries travel past every hour , on a weekday morning . The 80 acre{Windmill Hill Business {Park}site has as it centrepiece a {windmill}brought from Chiseldon in 1984 and rebuilt to the condition it would have been when it was contructed in the 1820s. To the south of this there is a group of small industrial units . Also near junction 16 are the headquarters of the{Water Research Council}and the Anchor Butter Factory but{Tempco}, who distribute frozen foods to supermarkets , are closing their Swindon warehouse in a few weeks .
